roleset.name: obstruct, hinder
roleset.note: HAMPER-V NOTES: Can anyone say, "John hampers his clothes when he takes them off"? (from hamper.01-v)

example.name: active
example.text: A lack of enthusiasm with the latest economic data hampered the stock market's bid to extend Tuesday's sharp gains.
example.arg: A lack of enthusiasm with the latest economic data
the stock market's bid to extend Tuesday's sharp gains

example.name: passive
example.text: ...[the company's performance]-1 was hampered *trace*-1 by problems tied to the introduction of a major new family of computers in April.
example.arg: by problems tied to the introduction of a major new family of computers in April

example.name: ARG0 and ARG2 and ARG1
example.text: But let 's talk about some of the hurdles that hamper humans to be able to survive there .
example.arg: to be able to survive there
